mapper.select: SELECT tmp.`Name` monitorPointName, tmp.MonitorType monitorType, tpi.ProjectName projectName, tpt.TypeName projectTypeName, ts.ID sensorID, IF(ts.`Status` IS NULL,-1,ts.`Status`) "status", tmt.TypeName monitorTypeName, (CASE tmi.MonitorClass WHEN 0 THEN '环境监测' WHEN 1 THEN '安全监测' WHEN 4 THEN '视频监测' ELSE '其它' END ) monitorTypeClass, tmi.`Name` monitorItemName, TRIM( BOTH '"' FROM JSON_EXTRACT( tpi.Location, "$.town" ) ) areaCode, t1.customColumn, t2.upperName, t3.fieldTokenUpperNames FROM tb_monitor_point tmp LEFT JOIN tb_project_info tpi ON tpi.ID = tmp.ProjectID LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_type tmt ON tmt.MonitorType = tmp.MonitorType LEFT JOIN tb_sensor ts ON ts.MonitorPointID = tmp.ID LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_item tmi ON tmi.ID = tmp.MonitorItemID LEFT JOIN tb_project_type tpt ON tpt.ID = tpi.ProjectType LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tmi1.ID monitorItemID, GROUP_CONCAT( "{", tmtf.FieldName, (CASE tdu.EngUnit WHEN NULL THEN '' WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT("(", tdu.EngUnit, ")") END), ":", tmtf.FieldToken, "}" ) customColumn FROM tb_monitor_item tmi1 LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_item_field tmif ON tmif.MonitorItemID = tmi1.ID LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_type_field tmtf ON tmtf.ID = tmif.MonitorTypeFieldID LEFT JOIN tb_data_unit tdu ON tdu.ID = tmtf.FieldUnitID WHERE tmtf.FieldClass IN (1,2) GROUP BY tmi1.ID ) t1 ON t1.monitorItemID = tmi.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TRIM( BOTH '"' FROM JSON_EXTRACT( twt.CompareRule, "$.upperName" ) ) upperName, tmp2.ID MonitorPointID FROM tb_warn_log twl LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_point tmp2 ON twl.MonitorPointID = tmp2.ID LEFT JOIN tb_sensor ts2 ON ts2.MonitorPointID = tmp2.ID LEFT JOIN tb_warn_trigger twt ON twt.ID = twl.triggerID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX( WarnTime ) latest_time, MonitorPointID FROM tb_warn_log GROUP BY MonitorPointID ) twl1 ON twl.MonitorPointID = twl1.MonitorPointID WHERE twl1.latest_time = twl.WarnTime AND ts2.`Status` IN ( 1, 2, 3, 4 ) ) t2 ON t2.MonitorPointID = tmp.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tmp.ID monitorPointID, GROUP_CONCAT( "{", twt.FieldToken, ":", TRIM( BOTH '"' FROM JSON_EXTRACT( twt.CompareRule, "$.upperName" ) ) ,"}" ) fieldTokenUpperNames FROM tb_monitor_point tmp LEFT JOIN tb_warn_rule twr ON twr.MonitorPointID = tmp.ID LEFT JOIN tb_warn_trigger twt ON twt.RuleID = twr.ID GROUP BY tmp.ID ) t3 ON t3.monitorPointID = tmp.ID WHERE tpi.CompanyID = #{companyID} AND tmi.MonitorClass IN (0,1,4) AND tmt.TypeName IS NOT NULL AND tmp.CreateTime <= #{endTime}
